## Example visual

Where is the Trafford Data Lab?
<br>

```{r, echo=FALSE}
leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles(urlTemplate = "http://{s}.basemaps.cartocdn.com/light_all/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",
           attribution = '&copy; <a href="http://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> &copy; <a href="https://carto.com/attribution">CartoDB</a>, <a href="https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geography/licences">| Contains OS data Â© Crown copyright and database right (2017)</a>',
           options = tileOptions(minZoom = 14, maxZoom = 17)) %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = -2.329774, lat = 53.421981, popup="Trafford Data Lab") %>% 
  frameWidget(height='325')
```

## Code

```{r fig.height = 3, dev = 'svg'}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x="Fuel efficiency (mpg)", y="Weight (tons)",
       title="Fuel economy declines as weight increases")
```
